sentences.sContent: “That’s forbidden, ” said study co-author and Stony Brook University biophysicist Koon-Kiu Yan.
sentences.sContent_eng: “That’s forbidden, ” said study co-author and Stony Brook University biophysicist Koon-Kiu Yan.
sentences.sCn: “那是不允许的，”研究合著者纽约州立大学石溪分校生物物理学家严贯桥说道。

remMethod.val: bio(生物) + physicist(物理学家) → 生物物理学家
